#Text=Lockerbie

#Text=Lockerbie ( Scottish Gaelic : Logarbaidh ) is a small town in Dumfries and Galloway , most famous as the setting for the tragic 1988 crash of Pan Am flight 103 , following the detonation of a bomb on board .
#Text=By road
#Text=Lockerbie is just off the A74(M ) which links Glasgow with Carlisle and the south .
#Text=By train
#Text=is served primarily by First Transpennine Express trains from Manchester Airport to Glasgow and Edinburgh via Carlisle .
#Text=Occasional Virgin trains may be available from London Euston and Birmingham but trains to these destinations usually require a change at Carlisle .
#Text=Lockerbie is about an hour by train from both Glasgow and Edinburgh and about 2 hours 15 minutes from Manchester ( another 15 minutes gets you to Manchester Airport )
#Text=See
#Text=Dryfesdale Lodge Visitors ' Centre .
#Text=An exhibition on the history of Lockerbie , and of Flight 103 .
#Text=The memorial garden is nearby
#Text=Hallmuir P.O.W. Chapel ( About 1 mile from Lockerbie ) .
#Text=Built by Ukrainians who came to Scotalnd from Italy in 1947 .
#Text=Lockerbie Air Disaster Memorial Window ( Lockerbie Town Hall ) . office hours .
#Text=Do
#Text=Eskrigg Reserve ( Lockerbie Wildlife Trust ) ( Just outside of Lockerbie on the A709 , opposite Dryfesdale Lodge Visitors ' Centre ) .
#Text=Pleasant woodland walks surrounding the site of an old curling pond .
#Text=Lockerbie Ice Rink , 14 Glasgow Road , Lockerbie , DG11 2AR , ☏ +441576202197 , ✉ icerink@btconnect.com .
#Text=Buy
#Text=Cobwebs of Lockerbie ( Cobwebs Antiques ) , 30 Townhead Street , Lockerbie , DG11 2AG , ☏ +4415762202554 . 09:00 - 17:00 , Closed Sundays .
#Text=Antiques , Reproductions , and Curios .
#Text=Featured on the BBC TV series " Antiques Road Trip " .
#Text=Eat
#Text=Just Be Bistro , 53 High St , ☏ +441576205715 .
#Text=Café 91 , 91 High Street , Lockerbie , DG11 2DA , ☏ +441576202379 . 08:30 - 17:00 .
#Text=Cozy , casual café popular with locals .
#Text=Drink
#Text=The Royal Bar , 6 Station Road , Lockerbie , DG11 2HA , ☏ +441576202374 . 11:00 - 23:00 .
#Text=Cosy , casual pub , featuring a pool table and darts .
#Text=The Black Bull , 13 Station Road , Lockerbie , DG11 2HA , ☏ +441576202647 . 11:00 - 23:00 .
#Text=Bar with outdoor beer seating area .
#Text=Sleep
#Text=Riverside Mill Bed and Breakfast , Dalton Hook , Lockerbie , DG11 1DG , ☏ +441576510016 .
#Text=Experience the spectacular sights and sounds of the River Annan cascading through the grounds of the peaceful Riverside Mill B&B whilst still only being 3 miles away from the M74 ( M6 ) .
#Text=£60 .
#Text=The Townhead Hotel , Townhead Street , Lockerbie , DG11 2AG , ☏ +441576204627 .
#Text=Check-in : 12pm-10pm , check-out : 11am .
#Text=Less than 5 minutes walk from Lockerbie Train Station , the Townhead offers well-appointed bed and breakfast accommodation .
#Text=There is free WiFi and a private car park .
#Text=The Crown Hotel , 95 High Street , Lockerbie , DG11 2DA , ☏ +4401576203382 .
#Text=Situated in the centre of town , a short walk from the station , with convenient links to local bus services .
#Text=King 's Arms Hotel , 29 High Street , Lockerbie DG11 2JL , ☏ +441576202410 , ✉ info@kingsarmshotel.co.uk .
#Text=Pet friendly , Wi-Fi throughout hotel , Complimentary bottled water , Tea & Coffee Making Facilities , Meeting facilities
#Text=Somerton House Hotel ( The Somerton ) , 35 Carlisle Road , Lockerbie , DG11 2DR , ☏ +441576202583 .
#Text=The Queen 's Hotel , Old Annan Road , Lockerbie , DG11 2RB , ☏ +441576202415 , ✉ info@queenshotellockerbie.co.uk .
#Text=Check-in : 14:00 , check-out : 11:00 .
#Text=A privately run country house hotel standing in over three acres of its own grounds and gardens .
